name: Sage Sword
description:
This game was conceived by accident, so this is a simple alpha, just to see if the community likes this idea or not. If you like it, I will transfer the game to another engine and make normal graphics, as well as make other mechanics.

For now, I just want to see if this idea is a good one.

But I remind you that everything depends on you, although I am basically sure that I will not achieve anything, I will try to do something.
